content.rendered:
9th IEEE International Symposium on Smart Electronic Systems

18-20 DEC 2023

Nirma University, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India

Accommodation details

Dear Author,

We welcome you for presenting your work towards submitted manuscripts in IEEE-iSES conference 2023. This conference is scheduled during December 18-20, 2023 at Nirma University, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. For attending this conference, you may refer to the following guide related to accommodation:

For Female Author

We can provide accommodation for female authors at our Nirma University girls hostel with the following charges:

Room DetailsNo. AvailableRate of Room (Rs.)
NON-AC and without Washroom (Stay in double occupancy)08200/- (Per Person Per night)
With AC and without Washroom (Stay in double occupancy)06400/- (Per Person Per night)
AC and Washroom Accommodation in hostels (Stay in double occupancy)02450/- (Per Person Per night)

For Male Author

Unfortunately, we are unable to provide accommodation for male authors at our campus. However, we can suggest a
few of the hotels near Nirma University within 10-15 minutes’ drive:

  • Hotel RK Palace
  • Hotel Green Stay, Jagatpur
  • Hotel Unity, Ghatlodia
  • Eulogia Inn
  • Hotel Sparsh Inn
  • Aarya Grand Hotels & Resorts
  • The Hillock
  • Vivanta

For any further queries, please feel free to mail on rutul.patel@nirmauni.ac.in with a subject “AccommodationQuery for iSES-2023”

jetpack-related-posts.title: Sister Conference
jetpack-related-posts.author: Northotech Solutions
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: iSES is a sponsored meeting of the Technical Committee on VLSI, IEEE-CS (http://www.ieee-tcvlsi.org/) that endorses a league of successful meetings such as ARITH, ASAP, iSES, ISVLSI, etc., which are presented as “Sister Conferences”. The following link has more details of these : https://www.computer.org/web/tcvlsi/tcvlsi-sister-conferences.
